customCards:DefaultOrb.NAME: Default Orb
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the start of your turn, draw #b

customCards:MondayOrb.NAME: Monday Orb
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: Week just started. You're getting into your work. NL No status effects

customCards:TuesdayOrb.NAME: Tuesday Orb
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: You feel productive and plan ahead. NL Scry 4

customCards:WednesdayOrb.NAME: Wednesday Orb
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: TELEPHONE SERVICE DAY NL Gain 2 Telephone Service cards

customCards:ThursdayOrb.NAME: Thursday Orb
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: It's intern day and you feel free. NL Gain 2 [E]

customCards:FridayOrb.NAME: Friday Orb
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: Long have you waited. Go enjoy your weekend. NL Gain 1 Strength, Dexterity and draw 3 cards
